doc.after: Renewable energy is generally defined as energy that comes from resources which are naturally replenished on a human timescale such as sunlight wind rain tides waves and geothermal heat 98 Renewable energy replaces conventional fuels in four distinct areas electricity generation hot water space heating motor fuels and rural off grid energy services 99
